description.title: Sportt Ecommerce
description.info:
A custom e-commerce, designed to meet the specific needs of the client, includes mercadopago payment integration, a custom admin panel, and a user-friendly interface.
Client: Next.js with Tailwind and Shadcn.
Server: Nest.js with Prisma ORM.

description.title: Negocio Smart
description.stack: Django-rest, Angular, GCP, Docker, Tailwind, Material UI
description.info:
A purchases management system , allows you to keep intelligent control of your purchases and their payments, also you could manage suppliers and products.
Client: Angular with use Fuse Theme (Tailwind to style) .
Server: An API made in Django Rest Framework.

description.title: Aula 365
description.stack: Angular, Material UI, Django Rest, Docker, GCP
description.info:
A basic management system , where allow create students and generate course registrations.
Client: Angular with Material UI deployment in Netlify.
Server: An API made in DRF deployment using Docker and GCP.

description.title: Signature Detector
description.info: This object detection app allows you to detect signature sections in physical documents; the images have previously been cropped, filtered and adapted to enter the Yolo Network.
